title_game_selection: WEEE R Robots: select the class and start to play
confirm_buy_message: Do you really wanna buy the item?
label_recycle_value: Put the item in the box GREEN IDEA
label_recycle_reuse: Put the item in the box REUSE
label_recycle_recycle: Put the item in the bin RECYCLE
label_insert_itemId: Insert the ID of the object
go_to_robot: Go to my Robot and see your credit
which_piece: Which piece do you want change?
label_close_item_subtitle: Use the app on the smarthphone for scanning the bar-code on the object, get credits and upgrade your robot
question_broken: Does the item have broken or missing parts?
question_year: Is the item older than 5 years?
info_type: It works if you can still use it for its main functions. For example, a mobile phone that works well but has a slight scratch on the screen. It doesn’t work if you can’t use it anymore. For example, a hairdryer that turns on and only cold air comes out.
info_on_off: It works if you can still use it for its main functions. For example, a mobile phone that works well but has a slight scratch on the screen. It doesn’t work if you can’t use it anymore. For example, a hairdryer that turns on and only cold air comes out.
info_broken: Check if components that should be part of the item are missing or broken. For example, a blender without a lid or a mobile phone with a broken screen.
info_year: This information is used to give a “value” to the device.
recap_broken: It has broken or missing parts:
recap_year: Is it more than 5 years old?:
label_bring_stuff: Bring to school other items you dn't use anymore and get some credits upgrading your robot
label_marker_recycle_string_value: Attach the yellow sticker on the item to remind you to throw it into the Recycle Bin
label_marker_recycle_string_reuse: Attach the blue sticker on the item to remind you  to throw it into  the Reuse Bin
label_marker_recycle_string_recycle: attach the green sticker on the item to remind you to throw it into the Repair Bin.
label_subtitle_recap: Che the correctness of your data
click_class_back: Go back clicking again on the class you have just clicked
garbage_donation_label: During the collection {{numeroRaccolta}}  you have dontated coins to the following classes:
garbage_received_label: During the collection {{numeroRaccolta}} you have received coins from:
donate_label: If you bought enough parts for your robot, you can give all your remaining coins to other classes who have fewer. This way, you can help them complete their robots
header_confirm: With this action, you can help other classes that need coins to buy parts for their robots.
message_confirm: Are you sure to give all your coins?
message_donated: Thank you for your generosity! ! You gave your coins to class {{classe}} and you have earned a star!
donate_server_error: Error with the server during your donation!
